List.quote: Believe It!
List.author: Naruto Uzumaki

List.quote: Those who break the rules are scum, that's true, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.
List.author: Kakashi Hatake

List.quote: When a man learns to love, he must bear the risk of hatred.
List.author: Madara Uchiha

List.quote: I care more about others than I do myself, and I won’t let anyone hurt them.
List.author: Naruto Uzumaki

List.quote: My friends were the first to accept me for who I am.
List.author: Naruto Uzumaki

List.quote: Don’t underestimate me! I don’t quit and I don’t run.
List.author: Naruto Uzumaki

List.quote: Failing doesn’t give you a reason to give up, as long as you believe.
List.author: Naruto Uzumaki

List.quote: Love breeds sacrifice, which in turn breeds hatred. Then you can know pain.
List.author: Naruto Uzumaki

List.quote: Once you question your own belief, it’s over.
List.author: Naruto Uzumaki

List.quote: When you give up, your dreams and everything else they’re gone.
List.author: Naruto Uzumaki

List.quote: Hard work is worthless for those that don’t believe in themselves.
List.author: Naruto Uzumaki

List.quote: Somebody told me I’m a failure, I’ll prove them wrong.
List.author: Naruto Uzumaki

List.quote: However strong you become, never seek to bear everything alone. If you do, failure is certain.
List.author: Itachi Uchiha

List.quote: It is not wise to judge others based on your own preconceptions and by their appearances.
List.author: Itachi Uchiha

List.quote: He who forgives and acknowledges himself... that is what it truly means to be strong!
List.author: Itachi Uchiha

List.quote: The ones who aren't able to acknowledge their own selves are bound to fail.
List.author: Itachi Uchiha

List.quote: If you want to know who you are, you have to look at your real self and acknowledge what you see.
List.author: Itachi Uchiha

List.quote: I have already awakened.
List.author: Sasuke Uchiha

List.quote: I have long since closed my eyes… My only goal is in the darkness.
List.author: Sasuke Uchiha

List.quote: Having too many bonds causes one to lose focus, weakening their strongest wish, their greatest desire.
List.author: Sasuke Uchiha

List.quote: Let this thunder, herald your end.
List.author: Sasuke Uchiha

List.quote: If you don’t share someone’s pain, you can never understand them.
List.author: Nagato Uzumaki

List.quote: The concept of hope is nothing more than giving up. A word that holds no true meaning.
List.author: Madara Uchiha

List.quote: The longer you live… The more you realize that reality is just made of pain, suffering and emptiness.
List.author: Madara Uchiha

List.quote: I’d be lying if I said things are going according to my plan… but beggars can’t be choosers, right?
List.author: Madara Uchiha

List.quote: People cannot show each other their true feelings. Fear, suspicion, and resentment never subside.
List.author: Madara Uchiha

List.quote: Never give up without even trying. Do what you can, no matter how small the effect it may have!
List.author: Onoki

List.quote: A place where someone still thinks about you is a place you can call home.
List.author: Jiraiya

List.quote: If you don’t like your destiny, don’t accept it. Instead have the courage to change it the way you want it to be.
List.author: Naruto Uzumaki

List.quote: If you don’t like the hand that fate’s dealt you with, fight for a new one!
List.author: Naruto Uzumaki

List.quote: When people are protecting something truly special to them, they truly can become… as strong as they can be.
List.author: Naruto Uzumaki

List.quote: It’s human nature not to realize the true value of something, unless they lose it.
List.author: Orochimaru

List.quote: The moment people come to know love, they run the risk of carrying hate.
List.author: Obito Uchiha

List.quote: Perhaps the companionship of an evil person is preferable to loneliness.
List.author: Gaara

List.quote: It’s because we help out when they’re in trouble that we can count on them to come running when we need it.
List.author: Shikamaru

List.quote: The difference between stupidity and genius, is that genius has its limits.
List.author: Neji

List.quote: A dropout will beat a genius through hard work.
List.author: Rock Lee

List.quote: If you believe in your dreams, I will prove to you, that you can achieve your dreams just by working hard.
List.author: Rock Lee

List.quote: My motto is to be stronger than yesterday, if I have to I’ll be stronger than half a day ago, even a minute ago!
List.author: Rock Lee

List.quote: A hero is not the one who never falls. He is the one that who gets up, again and again, never losing sight of his dreams.
List.author: Rock Lee

List.quote: In society, those who don’t have many abilities, tend to complain more.
List.author: Kakashi Hatake

List.quote: All men are not created equal.
List.author: Izuku Midoriya

List.quote: Don’t worry about what other people think. Hold your head up high and plunge forward.
List.author: Izuku Midoriya

List.quote: When the enemy becomes certain of their victory, that will be our chance.
List.author: Izuku Midoriya

List.quote: Sometimes I do feel like I’m a failure. Like there’s no hope for me. But even so, I’m not gonna give up. Ever!
List.author: Izuku Midoriya

List.quote: Whatever you say All Might, I’ll step up to this challenge! As long as you’re by my side, I can do anything. That’s how I feel anyway.
List.author: Izuku Midoriya

List.quote: I have to work harder than anyone else to make it! I’ll never catch up otherwise… I want be like you… Like you! The strongest hero.
List.author: Izuku Midoriya

List.quote: The deeper the darkness the more dazzling the light shines!
List.author: Izuku Midoriya

List.quote: Dreams can become reality!
List.author: Izuku Midoriya

List.quote: Should we have let people die, all in the name of the law? Isn’t it a hero’s job to save people?
List.author: Shoto Todoroki

List.quote: If you wanna stop this, then stand up” Because I’ve got one thing to say to you. Never forget who you want to become!
List.author: Shoto Todoroki

List.quote: The most inflated egos are often the most fragile.
List.author: All Might

List.quote: It’s not bad to dream. But you also have to consider what’s realistic.
List.author: All Might

List.quote: Whether you win or lose, looking back and learning from your experience is a part of life.
List.author: All Might

List.quote: When there’s nothing to be gained, rising to the challenge at those times, is surely the mark… of a true hero!
List.author: All Might

List.quote: Wanting to do it and being suitable for it are different issues.
List.author: Tenya Lida

List.quote: There’s nothing crueler than letting a dream end midway.
List.author: Shouta Aizawa

List.quote: If you’re going to become a hero, you don’t have time for such leisurely events.
List.author: Shouta Aizawa

List.quote: Never Forget Who You Want To Become!
List.author: Shoto Todoroki

List.quote: Nothing's perfect, the world's not perfect, but it's there for us, trying the best it can. That's what makes it so damn beautiful.
List.author: Roy Mustang

List.quote: Stand up and walk... Move on... After all, you have perfect legs to stand on...
List.author: Edward Elric

List.quote: How can you move forward if you keep regretting the past?
List.author: Edward Elric

List.quote: I think people should try to ignore their race, and just treat each other as equals.
List.author: Edward Elric

List.quote: Like I always say, can’t find a door? Make your own.
List.author: Edward Elric

List.quote: Life that has been lost cannot be brought back again. That very truth is what shows us the meaning and value of living.
List.author: Roy Mustang

List.quote: War does not determine who is right – only who is left.
List.author: Riza Hawkeye

List.quote: You’re not a good for nothing person. I think that being able to try your hardest to be something is a talent by itself.
List.author: Alphonse Elric

List.quote: It’s okay to feel lost and not have reasons.
List.author: Maria Ross

List.quote: What could be more beautiful than doing work that puts your soul at risk, because that’s what it means to be alive.
List.author: Solf J.

List.quote: There are some things in life that will only be understood through words.
List.author: Winry Rockbell

List.quote: I have no use for a religion that’s been forsaken by its own god.
List.author: Maes

List.quote: Maybe life has no equal trade. Maybe you can give up all you’ve got, and get nothing back. But still, even if I can’t prove it’s true, I have to try.
List.author: Edward Elric

List.quote: Nothing is ever completely negative.
List.author: Sheska

List.quote: Even when our eyes are closed, there’s a whole world out there that lives outside ourselves in our dreams.
List.author: Edward Elric

List.quote: Anyone who’s determined and perseveres will get something of value in return. Even if it’s not what they expected.
List.author: Alphonse Elric

List.quote: I know if I try my hardest, I’ll be rewarded. And I believe that applies to all of us. It doesn’t matter who you are, if you work hard, it pays off.
List.author: Edward Elric

List.quote: Human kind cannot gain anything without first giving something in return. To obtain, something of equal value must be lost.
List.author: Edward Elric

List.quote: But nothing’s ever perfect, haven’t you realized that yet? Earth turns on a tilted axis, just doing the best it can.
List.author: Van

List.quote: It’s like a book. Just because you’re mad and stop reading, doesn’t change the way it ends.
List.author: Edward Elric

List.quote: You said you worked hard? Well, maybe you need to work a little longer.
List.author: Saitama

List.quote: I’m not a hero because I want your approval. I do it because I want to!
List.author: Saitama

List.quote: I’ll leave tomorrow’s problems to tomorrow’s me.
List.author: Saitama

List.quote: Overwhelming strength is boring.
List.author: Saitama

List.quote: Human beings are strong because we can change ourselves.
List.author: Saitama

List.quote: You gotta train like hell until the point where your hair falls out. That’s the only way to become truly strong.
List.author: Saitama

List.quote: 100 Push ups. 100 sit ups. And 100 squats. Then a 10 kilometer run. Do it every single day!
List.author: Saitama

List.quote: If you really want to become strong, stop caring about what others think about you. Living your life has nothing to do with what others think.
List.author: Saitama
